CustomField.description: Text Question - Short: Short text response Text Question - Long: Long text response Text Question - Rich: Rich text response Text Question - URL: URL response Text Question - Email: Email response Yes-No Question: Yes/No response Customer Satisfaction: A customer satisfaction response Net Promoter: A customer satisfaction response (CSR) using NPS Numeric Scale: A CSR using numeric scale Image Scale: Customer satisfaction response using image scale Multiple Choice: Multiple answer choices Date: Date response Date Time: Date-Time response Number: Numeric value response Percentage: Percentage value response Document Upload: Allow user to download a document, then upload the document Rating: Star rating response Ranking: Rank set of choices Grid - Rating: Star rating in a tabular format Grid - Multiple Choice: Multiple choice in a tabular format Grid - Yes-No Question: Yes/No response in a tabular format Grid - Table: Tabular data response Certification: Electronic certification
CustomField.label: Type
